Description.Text: Just a few blocks from the lights of Broadway in Midtown Manhattan (N.Y.), the Moderne Hotel is a uniquely styled boutique. More than 20 Broadway theaters stand within 10 blocks of the hotel. The Moderne is also just three blocks from Carnegie Hall and a short walk to Central Park, Rockefeller Center and Fifth Avenue shopping.

• Central Park - 4 blocks • Times Square - 8 blocks • Saks Fifth Avenue - 8 blocks • Bloomingdale's - 9 blocks • Grand Central Terminal - 1.0 mile • Chrysler Building - 1.0 mile • Empire State Building - 1.25 miles • Metropolitan Museum of Art - 1.5 miles

This eight-story hotel in Midtown Manhattan offers 34 guestrooms and suites. Warm, theater-inspired decor includes large, oak-framed, full-length mirrors; teal velvet curtains; platform beds with silvery quilted headboards and velour throw pillows; brightly painted accent walls; and Andy Warhol’s famous portrait of Marilyn Monroe. Floor-to-ceiling windows frame street views. The room provides 24-hour complimentary coffee, wireless Internet access (surcharge), and a computer with high-speed Internet access (surcharge).

The hotel's slender building of brick-and-brownstone, art deco architecture and pop art panache mingle in playfully intelligent designs. Velvet curtains flanking the entryway lend the lobby a theatrical framing. With only 34 guestrooms, the Moderne provides a personable level of Service.

• Ice skating • Rowing or canoeing • Aerobics • Basketball • Tennis • Pilates classes/instruction • Yoga classes/instruction • Bicycle rentals • Horse riding/rental • Helicopter/airplane sightseeing • Bird watching • Playground
Check In Time - 3 p.m. Check Out Time - 12 p.m.
Nearby restaurants: • Carnegie Deli • Divine Bar • Red Garlic • Stage Deli • Ruby Foo’s • Lindy’s • Ray’s Pizza
